text: mariyu ide vidhanga cala mandi bahudaivaradhakulaku (musrikin laku) tama santana hatyanu - varu (allah ku sati kalpincina) bhagasvamulu - sarainaviga kanipincetatlu cesaru. Idi varini nasananiki guri ceyataniki mariyu vari dharmam variki sansayaspadamainadiga ceyataniki! Allah korite varu ala cesi undevaru kadu. Kavuna nivu varini vari kalpanalone vadalipettu
